coordinate_system_point_displacement.png.description: 3D coordinate system showing point P displacement to point P' with coordinate axes x, y, and z

xy_plane_strain_components.png.description: X-Y plane view diagrams showing displacement components and strain variation along y-axis with labeled points P, P', and incremental elements

angular_displacement_geometry.png.description: Geometric diagrams showing angular relationships with theta angles and displacement components Vx dx and Vy dx in different orientations

small_angle_approximation.png.description: Small angular diagram showing angle theta relationship with vertical and horizontal components

domain_with_cut_circular.png.description: Domain with cut showing circular region with inner hole and radial dimension labeled, illustrating simply connected domain concept

domain_after_cut_removal.png.description: Domain after cut removal showing circular region with hole, demonstrating displacement field continuity

elastic_stress_strain_curve.png.description: Stress-strain curve for elastic material showing loading and unloading phases with curved response

hyperelastic_component_reduction_matrice.description: Two matrices showing component relationships - left matrix labeled "non hyperelastic (36 components)" and right matrix labeled "hyperelastic (21 components)" with X marks indicating independent terms

strain_energy_complementary_energy_graph.description: Two stress-strain graphs side by side - left showing strain energy (du = σ dε) with hatched area, right showing complementary strain energy (du* = ε dσ) with hatched area under curve

legendre_transform_schematic.png.description: Schematic diagram showing Legendre transform concept with function g = σε - f, conjugate variables, and transformation notation
